tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE luxury_properties (
    property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    property_location VARCHAR(255),
    property_price DECIMAL,
    virtual_tour_link TEXT,
    virtual_reality_support BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE luxury_properties (
  property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  property_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  property_type VARCHAR(50),
  property_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  property_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_tours (
  tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT REFERENCES luxury_properties(property_id),
  tour_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  tour_description TEXT,
  tour_duration INT,
  tour_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    property_location VARCHAR(255),
    property_description TEXT,
    property_image_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_tours (
    tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    tour_name VARCHAR(255),
    tour_description TEXT,
    tour_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE client_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tour_id INT,
    client_name VARCHAR(100),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating DECIMAL(2,1)
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_properties (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    property_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE client (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(255),
  client_email VARCHAR(255),
  client_phone VARCHAR(15),
  client_budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE tour (
  tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT,
  client_id INT,
  tour_date DATE,
  tour_duration INT
);
